text: All personnel, property, records, functions, and unexpended balances of funds from the following agencies, offices, or units are transferred to the Customer Service Operations Unit, established pursuant to § 1-327.32:
historical:
Prior Codifications

2001 Ed., § 1-328.03.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-190, see notes following § 1-301.131.

DC CODE § 1-327.33

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Citywide Call Center established in § 1-327.01;
The Mayor's Correspondence Unit, established in Mayor's Order 73-172, issued November 5, 1973; and
The Tester Program in the Executive Office of the Mayor.
